6750.quoteText:
Indemnification

You agree to indemnify and hold SONIC, its parents, subsidiaries, officers, employees, agents, and SONIC Online Services website contractors and each of their officers, employees and agents harmless from any claims, damages and expenses, including reasonable attorneys' fees and costs, related to your violation of these Terms, including the Privacy Policy, or any violations thereof by your dependents or which arises from the use of User Content you submitted, posted, or otherwise provided to SONIC or the SONIC Online Services.

6751.quoteText: SONIC and its affiliated entities do not accept unsolicited ideas. Therefore, if you send any text, ideas, drawings, slogans, pictures, audio, video, or other information to SONIC through the SONIC Online Services, by e-mail or otherwise, your submission will become the property of SONIC, and SONIC will have no duty to preserve or return your submission. By sending your submission, you agree that your submission is not confidential nor proprietary and that SONIC may use and own your submission for any purpose whatsoever now and in the future without any obligation to obtain your permission or to compensate you.

6777.quoteText: SONIC may cancel your account and delete all User Content associated with your account at any time, and without notice, if SONIC deems that you have violated these Terms, the law, or for any other reason.

6978.quoteText:
SONIC displays interest-based advertising using information you make available to us when you interact with us or our partners.

6979.quoteText: The third parties we work with participate in the Self-Regulatory Program for Online Behavioral Advertising.
